00014 #include "SimpleMono.h"
00015 
00016 #include <wx/intl.h>
00017 
00018 class wxString;
00019 
00020 class EffectFadeIn: public EffectSimpleMono {
00021 
00022  public:
00023    virtual wxString GetEffectName() {
00024       return wxString(_("Fade In"));
00025    }
00026    
00027    virtual std::set<wxString> GetEffectCategories() {
00028       std::set<wxString> result;
00029       result.insert(wxT("http://lv2plug.in/ns/lv2core#UtilityPlugin"));
00030       return result;
00031    }
00032 
00033    virtual wxString GetEffectIdentifier() {
00034       return wxString(wxT("FadeIn"));
00035    }
00036 
00037    virtual wxString GetEffectAction() {
00038       return wxString(_("Fading In"));
00039    }
00040 
00041  protected:
00042    sampleCount mSample;
00043    sampleCount mLen;
00044 
00045    virtual bool NewTrackSimpleMono();
00046    
00047    virtual bool ProcessSimpleMono(float *buffer, sampleCount len);
00048 };
00049 
00050 class EffectFadeOut:public EffectSimpleMono {
00051 
00052  public:
00053    virtual wxString GetEffectName() {
00054       return wxString(_("Fade Out"));
00055    }
00056    
00057    virtual std::set<wxString> GetEffectCategories() {
00058       std::set<wxString> result;
00059       result.insert(wxT("http://lv2plug.in/ns/lv2core#UtilityPlugin"));
00060       return result;
00061    }
00062 
00063    virtual wxString GetEffectIdentifier() {
00064       return wxString(wxT("FadeOut"));
00065    }
00066 
00067    virtual wxString GetEffectAction() {
00068       return wxString(_("Fading Out"));
00069    }
00070 
00071  protected:
00072    sampleCount mSample;
00073    sampleCount mLen;
00074 
00075    virtual bool NewTrackSimpleMono();
00076
